snippet.title: Quest Forge: by Order of Kings
snippet.description:
Quest Forge is a new and amazing adventure game from Ludosity, the makers of MURI and Princess Remedy.

Get ready to heed the kings order and save the land from evil, once more in this NES sequel to the original Atari 2600 game. Now with more colors, sounds and even gameplay, than ever before!

Quest Forge for the NES will be available this summer in stores and by mail order!
